xmlns.dct:title: ICES Statistical Areas
xmlns.dc:subject: Statistical units
fishery
marine fishery
fisheries management
boundaries
xmlns.dct:abstract: The ICES Statistical Areas delineates the divisions and subdivisions of FAO Major Fishing area 27. The ICES Statistical Areas are used as bounding areas for calculation of fish statistics, e.g. catch per unit effort (CPUE) and stock estimates.
